scripts.build:html: pug --pretty src/pug/pages/*.pug --out dist && pug --pretty src/pug/blog --out dist/blog  && pug --pretty src/pug/pages/annotations/*.pug --out dist/annotations && pug --pretty src/pug/pages/etc/*.pug --out dist/etc
scripts.build:css: rimraf dist/css && mkdir dist/css && cp -r src/sass/*.css dist/css && sass src/sass/:dist/css
scripts.build:js: rimraf dist/js && mkdir dist/js && cp -r src/js/* dist/js
scripts.build:misc: cp -r src/misc/* dist/ && mkdir dist/images && cp -r src/images/* dist/images && cp src/images/icons/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:misc
